title: Awarding of contracts for five civil work contract packages in the Northern Province under the Asian Development Bank funded Second Integrated Road Investment Programme
decision_details: - The proposal made by the Minister of Highways & Road Development and Petroleum Resources Development to award the contract package for the rehabilitation/improvement and maintenance of 67.64 km of rural roads in the Jaffna District to WKK Engineering Company (Pvt.) Ltd. in joint venture with World Kaihatsu Kogyo Company Ltd. (Japan), contract package for rehabilitation/improvement and maintenance of 71.81 km of rural roads in the same District for the China State Construction Engineering Corporation Ltd. (China), the contract package for rehabilitation/improvement and maintenance of 60.31 km of rural roads in the Killinochchi District to Sri Ram Construction and the contract packages for rehabilitation/improvement and maintenance of 56.03 km and 61.30 km of rural roads in the Mannar District to K.D.A. Weerasinghe & Company  (Pvt.) Ltd., was approved by the Cabinet.
